snippet: BP’s exploration activity, the lifeblood of an oil company, came to a near halt after the Gulf of Mexico spill, but this year BP plans to drill 16 to 18 exploration wells, an executive said.
abstract: BP plans to drill 16 to 18 exploration wells with an overall exploration cost of about $3 billion, indicating recovery from paralysis that followed the 2010 Gulf of Mexico disaster.
lead_paragraph: BP’s exploration activity, the lifeblood of an oil company, came to a near halt after the Gulf of Mexico spill, but this year BP plans to drill 16 to 18 exploration wells, an executive said.

headline.print_headline: BP Plans to Restart Exploratory Drilling
